segments.text: I see the water just overflowing from the sink, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing right in it, but she doesn't even seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit anxious watching the water just pour out like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so sneaky, taking cookies right behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long the sink has been overflowing, with her just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really stretching to reach the cookie jar, and the stool looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn't fall and hurt himself, with his sister right there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely absorbed in drying that plate, not noticing anything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I need to warn her about the water and the children, but I can't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, such a contrast to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm everything seems, despite the potential for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR
